notes.text:
The consistency was insane. Using Abyss to toss a Whale and put something back to the opponent's hand is so broken. The only decks this struggled against were Aromage if Rose Lover was used to get out Bergamot and CA if you didn't manage to have 2 monsters present.

Using both SSA is a great way to burn through multiple CA/Saffira protection spells as the SSA both destroy independently of one another.
